Meaning in this regard (I ask) the venerables
Construction tattha + āyasmante
Sanskrit tatra + āyuṣmataḥ

Examples

tatth'āyasmante pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, dutiyam'pi pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, tatiyam'pi pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, parisuddh'etth'āyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evam'etaṃ dhārayāmī'ti.

VIN PAT NID nidānuddeso

tatth'āyasmante pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, dutiyam'pi pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, tatiyam'pi pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, parisuddh'etth'āyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evam'etaṃ dhārayāmī'ti.

VIN PAT PC suddhapācittiyā
tatthāyaṃ

sandhi. here this; in this case this [tattha + ayaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + pron
Meaning here this; in this case this
Construction tattha + ayaṃ
Sanskrit tatra + ayam

Examples

yo pana bhikkhu aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpeyya aññatra samayā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. tatth'āyaṃ samayo, acchinnacīvaro vā hoti bhikkhu, naṭṭhacīvaro vā, ayaṃ tattha samayo.

VIN PAT NP 6 aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadaṃ

yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhun'upassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. tatth'āyaṃ samayo, gilānā hoti bhikkhunī, ayaṃ tattha samayo.

VIN PAT PC 23 bhikkhunupassayasikkhāpadaṃ
tatthāhaṃ 1

sandhi. there I [tattha + ahaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + pron
Meaning there I
Construction tattha + ahaṃ
Sanskrit tatra + aham

Examples

ekam'id'āhaṃ, āvuso ānanda, samayaṃ idh'eva sāvatthiyaṃ viharāmi andhavanasmiṃ. tatth'āhaṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjiṃ yathā n'eva pathaviyaṃ pathavisaññī ahosiṃ, na āpasmiṃ āposaññī ahosiṃ, na tejasmiṃ tejosaññī ahosiṃ

AN 10.7 sāriputtasuttaṃ

iminā tvaṃ, puṇṇa, mayā saṃkhittena ovādena ovadito katamasmiṃ janapade viharissasī'ti? atthi, bhante, sunāparanto nāma janapado, tatth'āhaṃ viharissāmī'ti.

SN 35.88 puṇṇasuttaṃ
tatthāhaṃ 2

sandhi. in that regard I [tattha + ahaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + pron
Meaning in that regard I
Construction tattha + ahaṃ
Sanskrit tatra + aham

Example

idha me, bho gotama, yaṃ ahosi dhanaṃ vā dhaññaṃ vā rajataṃ vā jātarūpaṃ vā sabbaṃ taṃ puttānaṃ dāyajjaṃ niyyātaṃ, tatth'āhaṃ anovādī anupavādī ghāsacchādanaparamo viharāmi.

MN 54 potaliyasuttaṃ
tatthupapanna

adj. arisen there; re-arisen in that place [tattha + upapanna] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning arisen there; re-arisen in that place
Construction tattha + upapanna
Synonym tatthuppanna
Variant tatthūpapanna, tattha upapanna
tatthuppanna

adj. arisen there; re-arisen in that place [tattha + upanna] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning arisen there; re-arisen in that place
Construction tattha + upanna
Synonym tatthupapanna, tatthūpapanna
tatthūpapanna

adj. arisen there; re-arisen in that place [tattha + upapanna] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning arisen there; re-arisen in that place
Construction tattha + upapanna
Synonym tatthuppanna
Variant tattha upapanna, tatthupapanna
tatthetaṃ

sandhi. then this [tattha + etaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + pron
Meaning then this
Construction tattha + etaṃ
Sanskrit tatra + etam

Examples

yoniso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu manasi karonto akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetī'ti. etam'atthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatth'etaṃ iti vuccati

ITI 16 paṭhamasekhasuttaṃ

imā kho, bhikkhave, dve nibbānadhātuyo'ti. etam'atthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatth'etaṃ iti vuccati

ITI 44 nibbānadhātusuttaṃ
tattheva

sandhi. right there; in that place; on the spot; there and then [tattha + eva] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind
Meaning right there; in that place; on the spot; there and then
Construction tattha + eva
Sanskrit tatra + eva

Examples

puriso ca te ukkhitt'āsiko piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhissati. yatth'eva naṃ thokam'pi chaḍḍessati tatth'eva te siro pātessatī'ti.

SN 47.20 janapadakalyāṇīsuttaṃ

tiṭṭhe ce so tattha anānuyāyī,
pūgam'pi vassānaṃ samantacakkhu,
tatth'eva so sītisiyā vimutto,
cavetha viññāṇaṃ tathāvidhassa.

SNP 61 upasīva māṇava pucchā
pārāyanavaggo 6
tatthevantaradhāyi

sandhi. disappeared right there; vanished on the spot [tattha + eva + antaradhāyi] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind + aor
Meaning disappeared right there; vanished on the spot
Construction tattha + eva + antaradhāyi
Sanskrit tatra + eva + antardhā

Examples

idam'avoca, bhikkhave, tāyano devaputto, idaṃ vatvā maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatth'ev'antaradhāyi.

SN 2.8 tāyanasuttaṃ

idaṃ vatvā tatth'ev'antaradhāyi.

MN 23 vammikasuttaṃ
tatthevantaradhāyīti

sandhi. disappeared right there; vanished on the spot [tattha + eva + antaradhāyi + iti] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind + aor + ind
Meaning disappeared right there; vanished on the spot
Construction tattha + eva + antaradhāyi + iti
Sanskrit tatra + eva + antardhā + iti

Examples

idam'avoca kassapo devaputto, samanuñño satthā ahosi. atha kho kassapo devaputto samanuñño me satthā'ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatth'ev'antaradhāyī'ti.

SN 2.1 paṭhamakassapasuttaṃ

atha kho māro pāpimā, jānāti maṃ uppalavaṇṇā bhikkhunī'ti dukkhī dummano tatth'ev'antaradhāyī'ti.

SN 5.5 uppalavaṇṇāsuttaṃ
tatra kho

idiom. there; in that place ✓

Grammar idiom, adv + ind
Meaning there; in that place
Sanskrit tatra + khalu

Examples

ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bhoganagare viharati ānandacetiye. tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi, bhikkhavo'ti. bhadante'ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.

AN 4.180 mahāpadesasuttaṃ

tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi

MN 9 sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ
tatra 1

ind. there; in that place [ta + tra] ✓

Grammar ind, adv, from ta
Meaning there; in that place
Construction ta + tra
Derivative taddhita (tra)
Synonym tahaṃ, tahiṃ
Variant tattha
Sanskrit tatra

Examples

tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi

MN 9 sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ

tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi, bhikkhavo'ti. bhadante'ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ. bhagavā etadavoca

MN 40 cūḷāssapurasuttaṃ
tatra 2

ind. in that case; in that regard; in this matter; in this connection [ta + tra] ✓

Grammar ind, adv, from ta
Meaning in that case; in that regard; in this matter; in this connection
Construction ta + tra
Derivative taddhita (tra)
Variant tattha
Sanskrit tatra

Examples

tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū sampayojesuṃ, tatra-eko bhikkhu accasarā, atha kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno santike accayaṃ accayato deseti, so bhikkhu nappaṭiggaṇhāti.

SN 11.24 accayasuttaṃ

seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṃ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṃ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggam'akkhāyati.

SN 34.1 samādhimūlakasamāpattisuttaṃ
tatra tatra 1

idiom. here and there; everywhere ✓

Grammar idiom, adv + adv
Meaning here and there; everywhere
Sanskrit tatra + tatra

Example

y'āyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatra-abhinandinī, seyyath'idaṃ, kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā

DN 22.16 mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ
tatra tatra 2

idiom. this or that; any; each and every; here and there ✓

Grammar idiom, adv + adv
Meaning this or that; any; each and every; here and there
Sanskrit tatra + tatra

Example

yassa kassaci ca abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmeti abhiññāsacchikiriyāya tatra tatr'eva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.

AN 5.23 upakkilesasuttaṃ
tatraññatara

adj. there a certain [tatra + aññatara] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning there a certain
Construction tatra + aññatara
tatraṭṭha

adj. being there; belonging to that place ✗
tatraṭṭhaka

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning that remains in place; lit. standing there
Construction tatra + ṭhaka
tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇa

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning cover which remains in place (on the bed)
Construction tatraṭṭhaka + paccattharaṇa
tatraṭṭhita

adj. standing there [tatra + ṭhita] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning standing there
Construction tatra + ṭhita
tatratatra

ind. here and there; everywhere; all over [tatra + tatra] ✓

Grammar ind, adv, comp
Meaning here and there; everywhere; all over
Construction tatra + tatra
Compound dvanda (tatra ca tatra ca)
Sanskrit tatra + tatra

Examples

kathaṃ pan'āvuso, āyatiṃ punabbhav'ābhinibbatti hotī'ti? avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ kho, āvuso, sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ tatratatr'ābhinandanā, evaṃ āyatiṃ punabbhav'ābhinibbatti hotī'ti.

MN 43 mahāvedallasuttaṃ

y'āyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatr'ābhinandinī, seyyath'idaṃ, kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā

DN 22.16 mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ
tatratatrābhinandanā

fem. thoroughly enjoying this and that; taking delight here and there; relishing this and that [tatra + tatra + abhinandanā] ✓

Grammar fem, act, comp
Meaning thoroughly enjoying this and that; taking delight here and there; relishing this and that
Construction tatra + tatra + abhinandanā
Compound kammadhāraya (tatra + tatra + abhinandana)
Commentary (MNa) tatrātatr'ābhinandanā'ti rūp'ābhinandanā sadd'ābhinandanā'ti evaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ abhinandanā, karaṇavacane cetaṃ paccattaṃ. tatratatr'ābhinandanāya punabbhav'ābhinibbatti hotī'ti attho.
Sanskrit tatra + tatra + abhinandana

Example

kathaṃ pan'āvuso, āyatiṃ punabbhav'ābhinibbatti hotī'ti? avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ kho, āvuso, sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ tatratatr'ābhinandanā, evaṃ āyatiṃ punabbhav'ābhinibbatti hotī'ti.

MN 43 mahāvedallasuttaṃ
tatratatrābhinandī

adj. who takes delight here and there; thoroughly enjoying this and that; very happy with this and that [tatra + tatra + abhinandī] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning who takes delight here and there; thoroughly enjoying this and that; very happy with this and that
Construction tatra + tatra + abhinandī
Compound kammadhāraya (tatra + tatra + abhinandī)
Sanskrit tatra + tatra + abhinandin

Example

y'āyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatr'ābhinandinī, seyyath'idaṃ, kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā

DN 22.16 mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ
tatrapime

sandhi. in that case these just [tatra + api + ime] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind + pron
Meaning in that case these just
Construction tatra + api + ime
Variant tatthapime
Sanskrit tatra + api + ime

Example

yam'pi no saddhā gahapatikā divā vikāle paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā denti, tatra'p'ime mukh'āvaraṇaṃ maññe karontī'ti.

AN 4.122 ūmibhayasuttaṃ
tatramajjhattatā

fem. specific neutrality ✗
tatrassa 1

sandhi. there would be; there could be; there might be [tatra + assa] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + opt
Meaning there would be; there could be; there might be
Construction tatra + assa
Variant tatrāssa
Sanskrit tatra + syāt

Examples

tatr'assa kāṇo kacchapo. so vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṃ sakiṃ ummujjeyya.

SN 56.48 dutiyachiggaḷayugasuttaṃ

seyyathā'pi, bhante, rañño paccantimaṃ nagaraṃ daḷh'uddāpaṃ daḷhapākāratoraṇaṃ ekadvāraṃ, tatr'assa dovāriko paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī aññātānaṃ nivāretā ñātānaṃ pavesetā

DN 16.5 mahāparinibbānasuttaṃ
tatrassa 2

sandhi. in that case it would be [tatra + assa] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + opt
Meaning in that case it would be
Construction tatra + assa
Sanskrit tatra + syāt

Example

āhāretī'ti c'āhaṃ vadeyyaṃ, tatr'assa kallo pañho, ko nu kho, bhante, āhāretī'ti? evaṃ c'āhaṃ na vadāmi.

SN 12.12 moḷiyaphaggunasuttaṃ
tatrādhivāsaye

sandhi. he should endure there; he should continue in that place [tatra + adhivāsaye] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + opt
Meaning he should endure there; he should continue in that place
Construction tatra + adhivāsaye
Sanskrit tatra + adhivasayet

Example

phuṭṭho ḍaṃsehi makasehi,
araññasmiṃ brahāvane,
nāgo saṅgāmasīs'eva,
sato tatr'ādhivāsaye.

TH 178 yasojattheragāthā
tatrāpāsiṃ

sandhi. there I was [tatra + api + āsiṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind + pr
Meaning there I was
Construction tatra + api + āsiṃ
Commentary (VINa) tatr'āp'āsin'ti atha tatr'āpi bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā satt'āvāse sattanikāye vā puna ahosiṃ.
Sanskrit tatra + api + āsam

Example

tatrā'p'āsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evam'āhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evam'āyupariyanto, so tato cuto idh'ūpapanno'ti.

AN 10.21 sīhanādasuttaṃ
tatrāpāhaṃ

sandhi. only there I [tatra + api + ahaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind + pron
Meaning only there I
Construction tatra + api + ahaṃ
Sanskrit tatra + api + aham

Example

tatr'āp'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, n'eva āgatiṃ vadāmi, na gatiṃ, na ṭhitiṃ, na cutiṃ, na upapattiṃ. appatiṭṭhaṃ, appavattaṃ, anārammaṇam'ev'etaṃ. es'ev'anto dukkhassā'ti.

UD 71 paṭhamanibbānapaṭisaṃyuttasuttaṃ
tatrāpi

sandhi. even in that case; even in that situation; even then [tatra + api] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind
Meaning even in that case; even in that situation; even then
Construction tatra + api
Sanskrit tatra + api

Examples

vuttaṃ kho pan'etaṃ bhagavatā kakac'ūpam'ovāde, ubhatodaṇḍakena ce'pi, bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgam'aṅgāni okanteyyuṃ, tatr'āpi yo mano padūseyya na me so tena sāsanakaro'ti.

MN 28 mahāhatthipadopamasuttaṃ

tasmā't'iha, phagguna, tava ce'pi koci sammukhā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya, tatr'āpi tvaṃ, phagguna, ye gehasitā chandā ye gehasitā vitakkā te pajaheyyāsi.

MN 21 kakacūpamasuttaṃ
tatrābhirata

adj. really enjoying that; taking extreme pleasure in that; lit. delighted there [tatra + abhirata] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning really enjoying that; taking extreme pleasure in that; lit. delighted there
Construction tatra + abhirata
Sanskrit tatra + abhirata

Example

sā tattha rajjati tatr'ābhiramati. sā tattha rattā tatr'ābhiratā bahiddhā puris'indriyaṃ manasi karoti, purisakuttaṃ puris'ākappaṃ purisavidhaṃ purisacchandaṃ purisassaraṃ puris'ālaṅkāraṃ. sā tattha rajjati tatr'ābhiramati.

AN 7.51 saṃyogasuttaṃ
tatrābhiratimicchati

pr. wishes to find pleasure there; wants to get enjoyment there [tatra + abhiratiṃ + icchati] ~

Grammar pr, comp vb
Meaning wishes to find pleasure there; wants to get enjoyment there
Construction tatra + abhiratiṃ + icchati
Commentary (DHPa) tatr'ābhiratim'iccheyyā'ti yasmiṃ anālayasaṅkhāte viveke nibbāne imehi sattehi durabhiramaṃ, tatra abhiratiṃ iccheyya.
tatrābhiramati

pr. enjoys that; takes pleasure in that; lit. delights there [tatra + abhiramati] ✓

Grammar pr, comp vb
Meaning enjoys that; takes pleasure in that; lit. delights there
Construction tatra + abhiramati
Compound comp verb (tatra + abhiramati)
Sanskrit tatra + abhiramate

Example

itthī, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ itth'indriyaṃ manasi karoti, itthikuttaṃ itthākappaṃ itthividhaṃ itthicchandaṃ itthissaraṃ itth'ālaṅkāraṃ. sā tattha rajjati tatr'ābhiramati.

AN 7.51 saṃyogasuttaṃ
tatrāyaṃ

sandhi. in this regard this; in this case this [tatra + ayaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + pron
Meaning in this regard this; in this case this
Construction tatra + ayaṃ
Sanskrit tatra + ayam

Examples

tatr'āyam'ādi bhavati,
idha paññassa bhikkhuno,
indriyagutti santuṭṭhi,
pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro.

DHP 375 bhikkhuvaggo

gacchanto kho pana ujumaggen'eva gacchati, tatr'āyaṃ ujumaggo, seyyath'idaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākamm'anto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.

AN 8.13 assājānīyasuttaṃ
tatrāvatiṭṭhati

pr. lingers there; persists there ✗
tatrāvasissati

pr. remains there; is left over there ✗
tatrāvuso

sandhi. now friend; in this case brothers [tatra + āvuso] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + masc
Meaning now friend; in this case brothers
Construction tatra + āvuso
Sanskrit tatra + āyusmanto

Examples

tatr'āvuso, yv'āyaṃ puggalo aparisuddhakāyasamācāro parisuddhavacīsamācāro, kathaṃ tasmiṃ puggale āghāto paṭivinetabbo?

AN 5.162 dutiyaāghātapaṭivinayasuttaṃ

tatr'āvuso, majjhimā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṃsā bhavanti. satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekam'anusikkhantī'ti

MN 3 dhammadāyādasuttaṃ
tatrāssa

sandhi. there would be; there could be; there might be [tatra + assa] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + opt
Meaning there would be; there could be; there might be
Construction tatra + assa
Variant tatrassa
Sanskrit tatra + syāt

Example

seyyathā'pi, bhante, gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre pokkharaṇī. tatr'āssa kakkaṭako. atha kho, bhante, sambahulā kumārakā vā kumārikā vā tamhā gāmā vā nigamā vā nikkhamitvā yena sā pokkharaṇī ten'upasaṅkameyyuṃ

MN 35 cūḷasaccakasuttaṃ
tatrāssu

sandhi. there indeed [tatra + ssu] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind
Meaning there indeed
Construction tatra + ssu
Sanskrit tatra + sma, svid

Example

tatrāssu me idaṃ, sāriputta, tapassitāya hoti, acelako homi muttācāro hatth'āpalekhano, na ehibhaddantiko na tiṭṭhabhaddantiko

MN 12 mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ
tatridamekaṃ

sandhi. here is one; lit. here this one [tatra + idaṃ + ekaṃ] ~

Grammar sandhi, adv + pron + card
Meaning here is one; lit. here this one
Construction tatra + idaṃ + ekaṃ
tatridaṃ

sandhi. in this case this; lit. there this [tatra + idaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + pron
Meaning in this case this; lit. there this
Construction tatra + idaṃ
Synonym ayamettha
Sanskrit tatra + idam

Examples

saññācikāya pana bhikkhunā kuṭiṃ kārayamānena assāmikaṃ att'uddesaṃ pamāṇikā kāretabbā, tatr'idaṃ pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso dvādasa vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ satt'antarā

VIN PAT SA 6 kuṭikārasikkhāpadaṃ

kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikā kāretabbā, tatr'idaṃ pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo. taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

VIN PAT PC 90 kaṇḍuppaṭicchādisikkhāpadaṃ
tatrime

sandhi. there these; in this connection these [tatra + ime] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + pron
Meaning there these; in this connection these
Construction tatra + ime
Sanskrit tatra + ime

Examples

tatr'ime cattāro pārājikā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.

VIN PAT PA pārājikuddeso

tatr'ime bhūtā, timi timiṅgalo timitimiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā

UD 45 uposathasuttaṃ
tatrupapatti

fem. rebirth there; re-arising in that place [tatra + upapatti] ~

Grammar fem, comp
Meaning rebirth there; re-arising in that place
Construction tatra + upapatti
Synonym tatruppatti
tatrupayaññū

adj. knowing the appropriate means for that ✗
tatrupāya

adj. relevant to that; related to that; pertinent to that; suitable for that; lit. there means [tatra + upāya] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning relevant to that; related to that; pertinent to that; suitable for that; lit. there means
Construction tatra + upāya
Compound kammadhāraya (tatra + upāya)
Synonym tappatirūpī
Commentary (ANa) tatr'ūpāyāyā'ti tatr'upagamaniyāya.
Sanskrit tatra + upāya

Example

puna caparaṃ, subhūti, bhikkhu yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ ucc'āvacāni kiṃkaraṇīyāni tatra dakkho hoti analaso tatr'upāyāya vīmaṃsāya samannāgato alaṃ kātuṃ alaṃ saṃvidhātuṃ.

AN 11.14 subhūtisuttaṃ
tatruppatti

fem. rebirth there; re-arising in that place [tatra + uppatti] ~

Grammar fem, comp
Meaning rebirth there; re-arising in that place
Construction tatra + uppatti
Synonym tatrupapatti

fem. rebirth there [tatra + upapatti] ~

Grammar fem, comp
Meaning rebirth there
Construction tatra + upapatti

Meaning who get reborn there; who reappear there
Construction tatra + upapattika
Sanskrit tatra + aupapattika, upapattika (bsk)
tatrūpapanna

adj. reborn there; re-arose in that place [tatra + upapanna] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning reborn there; re-arose in that place
Construction tatra + upapanna
tatrūpāya

adj. being the appropriate means for that ✗
tatrekacca

pron. there someone; in this case some; in this regard someone [tatra + ekacca] ✓

Grammar pron, comp
Meaning there someone; in this case some; in this regard someone
Construction tatra + ekacca
Variant tatreka
Sanskrit tatra + ekatya

Examples

evaṃ vutte kathaṃ nu kho, bho, abhisaññānirodho hotī'ti? tatr'ekacce evam'āhaṃsu, ahetū appaccayā purisassa saññā uppajjanti'pi nirujjhanti'pi. yasmiṃ samaye uppajjanti, saññī tasmiṃ samaye hoti.

DN 9.2 poṭṭhapādasuttaṃ, abhisaññānirodhakathā

tatr'ekacce evam'āhaṃsu, rūpā kāmānaṃ aggan'ti. ekacce evam'āhaṃsu, saddā kāmānaṃ aggan'ti. ekacce evam'āhaṃsu, gandhā kāmānaṃ aggan'ti. ekacce evam'āhaṃsu, rasā kāmānaṃ aggan'ti.

SN 3.12 pañcarājasuttaṃ
tatreko

sandhi. there one; in that a case a certain [tatra + eko] ✓

Grammar sandhi, ind + pron
Meaning there one; in that a case a certain
Construction tatra + eko
Sanskrit tatra + eko

Example

tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū sampayojesuṃ, tatr'eko bhikkhu accasarā, atha kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno santike accayaṃ accayato deseti, so bhikkhu nappaṭiggaṇhāti.

SN 11.24 accayasuttaṃ
tatreva

sandhi. right there; just there [tatra + eva] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind
Meaning right there; just there
Construction tatra + eva
Sanskrit tatra + eva

Examples

addasā kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūrato'va āgacchantaṃ. disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca, tatr'eva, muṇḍaka, tatr'eva, samaṇaka, tatr'eva, vasalaka tiṭṭhāhī'ti.

SNP 7 vasalasuttaṃ
uragavaggo 7

yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā, so yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmeti abhiññāsacchikiriyāya, tatra tatr'eva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.

MN 119 kāyagatāsatisuttaṃ
tatvassa

sandhi. thereby to him; thereby his; lit. from that to him [tato + assa] ✓

Grammar sandhi, ind + pron
Meaning thereby to him; thereby his; lit. from that to him
Construction tato + assa
Commentary (SNa) tatv'assa hotī'ti tato assa hoti.
Sanskrit tatas + asmai

Example

saddhā dutiyā purisassa hoti,
no ce assaddhiyaṃ avatiṭṭhati,
yaso ca kittī ca tatv'assa hoti,
saggañ'ca so gacchati sarīraṃ vihāyā'ti.

SN 1.36 saddhāsuttaṃ
tatha 1

adj. true; real; actual [tathā + a] ✓

Grammar adj, from tathā
Meaning true; real; actual
Construction tathā + a
Derivative taddhita (a)
Antonym atatha
Synonym nippariyāya
Variant tatiya, tathiya, taccha
Commentary (DNa) tathā'ti yathā vuttā tathāsabhāvā.
Sanskrit tattva

Examples

tapanīyāni kammāni,
yāni dhammehi ārakā,
tāni ārocayissāmi,
taṃ suṇātha yathā tathaṃ.

AN 7.64 kodhanasuttaṃ

ākiñcaññasambhavaṃ ñatvā,
nandī saṃyojanaṃ iti,
evam'etaṃ abhiññāya,
tato tattha vipassati,
etaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathaṃ tassa,
brāhmaṇassa vusīmato'ti.

SNP 69 posāla māṇava pucchā
pārāyanavaggo 14
tatha 2

nt. truth [ta] ✗
tatha 3

masc. name of a privately enlightened Buddha; lit. truth [tathā + a] ~

Grammar masc, from tathā
Meaning name of a privately enlightened Buddha; lit. truth
Construction tathā + a
Derivative taddhita (a)
Sanskrit tattva
tathatā

fem. reality, such likeness, actuality [ta] ✗
tathatta 1

nt. such a state; such a condition [tathā + tta] ✓

Grammar nt, abstr, from tathā
Meaning such a state; such a condition
Construction tathā + tta
Derivative taddhita (tta)
Commentary (MNa) tath'attāyā'ti tathabhāvāya.
Sanskrit tathātva

Example

atha khv'assa pubb'eva tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetī'ti.

SN 41.6 dutiyakāmabhūsuttaṃ
tathatta 2

nt. doing likewise; lit. such state [tathā + tta] ✓

Grammar nt, abstr, from tathā
Meaning doing likewise; lit. such state
Construction tathā + tta
Derivative taddhita (tta)
Variant tadatthāya
Commentary (MNa) tath'attāyā'ti yaṃ so dhammaṃ deseti tathā bhāvāya, dhamm'ānudhammapaṭipattipūraṇ'atthāya paṭipajjantī'ti attho.
Sanskrit tathātva

Examples

luddho pan'āyaṃ, kālāmā, purisapuggalo lobhena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto pāṇam'pi hanati, adinnam'pi ādiyati, paradāram'pi gacchati, musā'pi bhaṇati, param'pi tathattāya samādapeti, yaṃ sa hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyā'ti.

AN 3.66 kesamuttisuttaṃ

ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṃ kāmānaṃ assādañ'ca assādato ādīnavañ'ca ādīnavato nissaraṇañ'ca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti te vata sāmaṃ vā kāme parijānissanti, paraṃ vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipanno kāme parijānissatī'ti, n'etaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.

MN 13 mahādukkhakkhandhasuttaṃ
tathatta 3

nt. truth [ta] ✗
tathatta 4

masc. true being; lit. true self [tatha + atta] ~

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning true being; lit. true self
Construction tatha + atta
Commentary (DNa) tathatto'ti tathasabhāvo
tathattā

ind. in truth; really; lit. from truth state [tathā + tta + ā] ✓

Grammar ind, adv, abl sg of tathatta
Meaning in truth; really; lit. from truth state
Construction tathā + tta + ā
tathatta + ā
Sanskrit tathātva

Examples

samitāvi pahāya puññapāpaṃ,
virajo ñatvā imaṃ parañ'ca lokaṃ,
jātimaraṇaṃ upātivatto,
samaṇo tādi pavuccate tathattā.

SNP 32 sabhiyasuttaṃ

khettāni viceyya kevalāni,
dibbaṃ mānusakañ'ca brahmakhettaṃ,
sabbakhettamūlabandhanā pamutto,
khettajino tādi pavuccate tathattā.

SNP 32 sabhiyasuttaṃ
tathattāya

sandhi. to do likewise; lit. for taking up like that ✗
tathariva

sandhi. exactly like this; just so [tathā + eva] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind
Meaning exactly like this; just so
Construction tathā + eva > riva
Phonetic Change e > ri (Kacc 22, 28)
Sanskrit tathā + eva

Example

evaṃ bhaṇeti, bhaṇayati, bhaṇāpeti, bhaṇāpayati. bhaṇenti, bhaṇayanti, bhaṇāpenti, bhaṇāpayanti. tatha'riva aññe'pi yojetabbā.

kaccāyana ākhyātakappa 438
tathalakkhaṇa

nt. true characteristic; immutable quality; (comm) unchangeable nature [tatha + lakkhaṇa] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning true characteristic; immutable quality; (comm) unchangeable nature
Construction tatha + lakkhaṇa
Compound kammadhāraya (tatha + lakkhaṇa)
Commentary (ANt) tathalakkhaṇaṃ aviparītasabhāvo.
Sanskrit tattva + lakṣaṇa

Example

vipassanā hi tīṇi lakkhaṇāni upanijjhāyatī'ti lakkhaṇ'ūpanijjhānaṃ. maggo vipassanāya āgatakiccaṃ sādhetī'ti lakkhaṇ'ūpanijjhānaṃ. phalaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ upanijjhāyatī'ti lakkhaṇ'ūpanijjhānaṃ.

SNa 1.36 saddhāsuttavaṇṇanā
tathavacana

adj. speaking the truth ✗
tathasutta 1

nt. Saṃyutta Nikāya 56.20 (SN56.20) ✗
tathasutta 2

nt. Saṃyutta Nikāya 56.27 (SN56.27) ✗
tathā

ind. so; thus; in such a way; likewise; similarly [ta + thā] ✓

Grammar ind, adv, from ta
Meaning so; thus; in such a way; likewise; similarly
Construction ta + thā
Derivative taddhita (thā)
Antonym aññathā, yathā
Synonym evaṃ, tassa
Sanskrit tathā

Examples

upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ tathā tatiyaṃ tathā catutthaṃ

DN 13.8 tevijjasuttaṃ

atthaṅ'gato so uda vā so n'atthi,
udāhu ve sassatiyā arogo,
taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi,
tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo.

SNP 61 upasīva māṇava pucchā
pārāyanavaggo 6
tathā tathā

idiom. in those ways; just like that ✓

Grammar idiom, adv + adv
Meaning in those ways; just like that
Antonym yathā yathā
Sanskrit tathā + tathā

Examples

yathā yathā vā pan'assa kāyo paṇihito hoti tathā tathā naṃ pajānāti

DN 22.3 mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ

yo, bhikkhave, evaṃ vadeyya, yathā yath'āyaṃ puriso kammaṃ karoti tathā tathā taṃ paṭisaṃvediyatī'ti, evaṃ santaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyavāso na hoti, okāso na paññāyati sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.

AN 3.101 loṇakapallasuttaṃ
tathā pi

idiom. even so, but ✗
tathā yathā

idiom. so … that; such … how ✓

Grammar idiom, adv + adv
Meaning so … that; such … how
Sanskrit tathā + yathā

Example

yathā kathaṃ pana, bhante, ariyassa vinaye soceyyaṃ hoti? sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathā ariyassa vinaye soceyyaṃ hotī'ti

AN 10.176 cundasuttaṃ
tathā hi

idiom. for so; for thus (as it has been said); for instance; because ✗
tathā hissa

idiom. regarding that ✗
tathākārī

adj. doing thus; acting like this [tathā + kārī] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning doing thus; acting like this
Construction tathā + kārī
tathāgata

masc. Such Become; Realised; being in such a state; arrived at the truth; epithet of the Buddha [tathā + gata] ✓

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning Such Become; Realised; being in such a state; arrived at the truth; epithet of the Buddha
Construction tathā + gata
tatha + āgata
Compound abyayībhāva (tathā + gata)
Commentary (SNa) tathāgatassā'ti tathā āgato'ti evamādīhi kāraṇehi tathāgatassa.
Notes Bhikkhu Sujāta: the EBTs give a fairly extensive set of interpretations for tathāgata, for example, "as he says, so he does". The overall sense is of one who speaks and acts in accordance with his realization of the truth, which fits the translation "the Realized One".
Sanskrit tathāgata

Examples

atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi, handa dāni, bhikkhave, āmantayāmi vo, vayadhammā saṅkhārā appamādena sampādethā'ti. ayaṃ tathāgatassa pacchimā vācā.

DN 16.36 mahāparinibbānasuttaṃ

n'āhaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, passāmi ... yo imesaṃ pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena cittaṃ ārādheyya, aññatra tathāgatena vā tathāgatasāvakena vā ito vā pana sutvā.

SN 46.53 aggisuttaṃ
tathāgataka

adj. (one) who goes in that way; goes accordingly ✗
tathāgataguṇa

masc. qualities of the Buddha [tathāgata + guṇa] ~

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning qualities of the Buddha
Construction tathāgata + guṇa
tathāgatatādi

nt. Buddha, etc. ✗
tathāgatanisevita

nt. track of the Such Become; trace of the Buddha [tathāgata + nisevita] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning track of the Such Become; trace of the Buddha
Construction tathāgata + nisevita
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (tathāgatassa + nisevita)
Commentary (MNa) tathāgatanisevitan'ti tathāgatassa ñāṇaphāsukāya nighaṃsitaṭṭhānaṃ.
Sanskrit tathāgata + niṣevita

Example

idam'pi vuccati, brāhmaṇa, tathāgatapadaṃ iti'pi, tathāgatanisevitaṃ iti'pi, tathāgat'ārañjitaṃ iti'pi. na tv'eva tāva ariyasāvako niṭṭhaṃ gacchati, sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho'ti.

MN 27 cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṃ
tathāgatapacchimavācā

fem. the Buddha's last words ✗
tathāgatapada

nt. footprint of the Such Become; footstep of the Buddha [tathāgata + pada] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning footprint of the Such Become; footstep of the Buddha
Construction tathāgata + pada
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (tathāgatassa + pada)
Commentary (MNa) tathāgatapadaṃ iti'pī'ti idam'pi tathāgatassa ñāṇapadaṃ ñāṇavaḷañjaṃ ñāṇena akkantaṭṭhānan'ti vuccati
Sanskrit tathāgata + pada

Example

idam'pi vuccati, brāhmaṇa, tathāgatapadaṃ iti'pi, tathāgatanisevitaṃ iti'pi, tathāgat'ārañjitaṃ iti'pi. na tv'eva tāva ariyasāvako niṭṭhaṃ gacchati, sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho'ti.

MN 27 cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṃ
tathāgatappavedita

adj. preached by the Realised One; proclaimed by the Such Become [tathāgata + pavedita] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning preached by the Realised One; proclaimed by the Such Become
Construction tathāgata + pavedita
Compound tatiyā tappurisa (tathāgatena + pavedita)
Sanskrit tathāgata + pravedita

Examples

evaṃ adhiccam'idaṃ, bhikkhave, yaṃ manussattaṃ labhati. evaṃ adhiccam'idaṃ, bhikkhave, yaṃ tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. evaṃ adhiccam'idaṃ, bhikkhave, yaṃ tathāgatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbati.

SN 56.48 dutiyachiggaḷayugasuttaṃ

evam'eva kho, bhikkhave, vessakulā ce'pi agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti, so ca tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ āgamma, evaṃ mettaṃ karuṇaṃ muditaṃ upekkhaṃ bhāvetvā labhati ajjhattaṃ vūpasamaṃ.

MN 40 cūḷāssapurasuttaṃ
tathāgatabala

nt. power of the Buddha [tathāgata + bala] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning power of the Buddha
Construction tathāgata + bala
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (tathāgatassa + bala)
Commentary (ANa) tathāgatabalānī'ti aññehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatass'eva balāni.
Sanskrit tathāgata + bala

Examples

dasa'y'imāni, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa tathāgatabalāni, yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti. katamāni dasa?

AN 10.21 sīhanādasuttaṃ

yam'pi, sāriputta, tathāgato anekadhātunānādhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idam'pi, sāriputta, tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti.

MN 12 mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ
tathāgatabhāsita

adj. spoken by the Buddha; preached by the Buddha [tathāgata + bhāsita] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning spoken by the Buddha; preached by the Buddha
Construction tathāgata + bhāsita
Compound tatiyā tappurisa (tathāgatena + bhāsita)
Synonym buddhabhāsita
Sanskrit tathāgata + bhāṣita

Example

ye te suttantā tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīr'atthā lok'uttarā suññatappaṭisaṃyuttā, tesu bhaññamānesu na sussūsissanti na sotaṃ odahissanti

Meaning regarding the Such Become
Construction tathāgata + vasa + ena
tathāgatavasa + ena
tathāgatavihāra

masc. Buddha’s meditation; Buddha’s dwelling; Buddha's state of mind [tathāgata + vihāra] ✓

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning Buddha’s meditation; Buddha’s dwelling; Buddha's state of mind
Construction tathāgata + vihāra
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (tathāgatassa + vihāra)
Sanskrit tathāgata + vihāra

Example

yañ'hi taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya, ariyavihāro iti'pi, brahmavihāro iti'pi, tathāgatavihāro iti'pi, ānāpānassatisamādhiṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya, ariyavihāro iti'pi, brahmavihāro iti'pi, tathāgatavihāro iti'pī'ti.

SN 54.11 icchānaṅgalasuttaṃ
tathāgatasāvaka

masc. disciple of the Buddha [tathāgata + sāvaka] ✓

Grammar masc, agent, comp
Meaning disciple of the Buddha
Construction tathāgata + sāvaka
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (tathāgatassa + sāvaka)
Synonym jinasāvaka
Sanskrit tathāgata + śrāvaka

Examples

n'āhaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, passāmi ... yo imesaṃ pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena cittaṃ ārādheyya, aññatra tathāgatena vā tathāgatasāvakena vā ito vā pana sutvā.

SN 46.53 aggisuttaṃ

so suṇāti tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā sabbesaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhāna-adhiṭṭhāna-pariyuṭṭhāna-abhinivesa-anusayānaṃ samugghātāya sabbasaṅkhārasamathāya sabb'ūpadhipaṭinissaggāya taṇhākkhayāya virāgāya nirodhāya nibbānāya dhammaṃ desentassa.

MN 22 alagaddūpamasuttaṃ
tathāgatasāvakasaṅgha

masc. community of the Buddha's disciples [tathāgata + sāvakasaṅgha] ~

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning community of the Buddha's disciples
Construction tathāgata + sāvakasaṅgha
Commentary (ITIa) tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho'ti aṭṭha-ariyapuggala-samūhasaṅkhāto diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhato tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho.
tathāgatasāsana

nt. Buddha’s teaching; Buddha’s message [tathāgata + sāsana] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning Buddha’s teaching; Buddha’s message
Construction tathāgata + sāsana
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (tathāgatassa + sāsana)
Synonym buddhasāsana
Sanskrit tathāgata + śāsana

Example

yo so, sāriputta, ariyasāvako tathāgate ek'antagato abhippasanno, na so tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā kaṅkheyya vā vicikiccheyya vā'ti?

tathāgatārañjita

Meaning marking of the Such Become; a place furrowed by the Buddha
Construction tathāgata + ārañjita
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (tathāgatassa + ārañjita)

Sanskrit tathāgata + ā + rañjita

Example

idam'pi vuccati, brāhmaṇa, tathāgatapadaṃ iti'pi, tathāgatanisevitaṃ iti'pi, tathāgat'ārañjitaṃ iti'pi. na tv'eva tāva ariyasāvako niṭṭhaṃ gacchati, sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho'ti.

Sanskrit tathā + nāśita

Example

yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇ'uddesaṃ upalāpeyya vā, upaṭṭhāpeyya vā, sambhuñjeyya vā, saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.

VIN PAT PC 70 kaṇṭakasikkhāpadaṃ
tathānipanna

adj. lying like that ✗
tathāpakkanta

adj. leaving thus; departing in that way ✗
tathāpaṭipanna

adj. practising like that [tathā + paṭipanna] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning practising like that
Construction tathā + paṭipanna
Commentary (VISMa) tathāpaṭipanno'ti yathā samathavipassanāsukhaṃ āvahati, yathā vā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṃ, tathā paṭipanno sāsanadhammo.
tathāpabbajita

adj. ordained like that; renounced in such a manner [tathā + pabbajita] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning ordained like that; renounced in such a manner
Construction tathā + pabbajita

adj. abandoned in such a way [tathā + pahīna] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning abandoned in such a way
Construction tathā + pahīna
tathāpi 1

sandhi. (gram) however [tathā + api] ~

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind
Meaning (gram) however
Construction tathā + api
tathāpi 2

sandhi. (gram) nevertheless [tathā + api] ~

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind
Meaning (gram) nevertheless
Construction tathā + api
tathābhāva

masc. suchness, such a condition ✗
tathābhūta

adj. of such nature; of such quality; just like that; lit. become like this [tathā + bhūta] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning of such nature; of such quality; just like that; lit. become like this
Construction tathā + bhūta
Compound kammadhāraya (tathā + bhūta)
Antonym yathābhūta
Sanskrit tathābhūta

Examples

so evaṃ pajānāti, tathābhūto kho ayaṃ kāyo yathābhūtasmiṃ kāye pāṇisamphassā'pi kamanti, leḍḍusamphassā'pi kamanti, daṇḍasamphassā'pi kamanti, satthasamphassā'pi kamanti.

MN 28 mahāhatthipadopamasuttaṃ

yaṃ tathābhūtassa rūpaṃ taṃ rūp'upādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṃ gacchati, yā tathābhūtassa vedanā sā vedan'upādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṃ gacchati

MN 28 mahāhatthipadopamasuttaṃ
tathābhūtaṃ

ind. in this way, likewise it become, as it is ✗
tathāyaṃ

sandhi. like this; such as he [tathā + ayaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + pron
Meaning like this; such as he
Construction tathā + ayaṃ
Sanskrit tathā + ayam

Example

atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito ekāyanena maggena tam'eva aṅgārakāsuṃ paṇidhāya. tam'enaṃ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṃ vadeyya, tath'āyaṃ bhavaṃ puriso paṭipanno tathā ca iriyati tañ'ca maggaṃ samārūḷho, yathā imaṃ'y'eva aṅgārakāsuṃ āgamissatī'ti.

MN 12 mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ
tathārūpa 1

adj. such; such kind; of such quality; so formed [tathā + rūpa] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning such; such kind; of such quality; so formed
Construction tathā + rūpa
Compound kammadhāraya (tathā + rūpa)
Synonym evarūpa, tādi, tādisa, tādī
Commentary (ANa) tathārūpo'ti tathājātiko.
Sanskrit tathārūpa

Examples

attadantassa posassa,
niccaṃ saññatacārino,
n'eva devo na gandhabbo,
na māro saha brahmunā,
jitaṃ apajitaṃ kayirā,
tathārūpassa jantuno.

DHP 104-105 sahassavaggo

tathārūpā'ssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manas'ānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.

AN 8.2 paññāsuttaṃ
tathārūpa 2

adj. such; such kind of [tathā + rūpa] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning such; such kind of
Construction tathā + rūpa
Compound kammadhāraya (tathā + rūpa)
Notes tathārūpa 1 is "aī adj", tathārūpa 2 is "a adj"
Sanskrit tathārūpa
tathārūpa 3

adj. suitable; appropriate; fitting [tathā + rūpa] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning suitable; appropriate; fitting
Construction tathā + rūpa
Compound kammadhāraya (tathā + rūpa)
Synonym anukūla, anucchavi, anucchavika, anulomika, upiya, kappa, tajja, tadanurūpa, paṭirūpa, patirūpa, patirūpī, pattayutta, yutta, yuttaka, yuttarūpa, sāmaggiya, sāruppa
Sanskrit tathārūpa

Examples

yo pana bhikkhu uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.

VIN PAT PC 48 uyyuttasenāsikkhāpadaṃ

yo pana bhikkhu santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ paviseyya aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā, pācittiyaṃ.

VIN PAT PC 85 vikālagāmappavesanasikkhāpadaṃ
tathārūpappaccaya

masc. suitable reason; appropriate cause; good reason [tathā + rūpa + paccaya] ✓

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning suitable reason; appropriate cause; good reason
Construction tathā + rūpa + paccaya
Compound kammadhāraya (tathārūpa + paccaya)
Variant tathā rūpappaccaya, rūpappaccaya
Sanskrit tathārūpa + pratyaya

Examples

yo pana bhikkhu uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.

VIN PAT PC 48 uyyuttasenāsikkhāpadaṃ

yo pana bhikkhu agilāno visibban'āpekkho jotiṃ samādaheyya vā samādahāpeyya vā aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.

VIN PAT PC 56 jotisikkhāpadaṃ
tathārūpāssa

sandhi. of such kind, for him [tathārūpā + assa] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adj + pron
Meaning of such kind, for him
Construction tathārūpā + assa
Sanskrit tathārūpa + asmai

Example

ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti, tathārūpā'ssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manas'ānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.

AN 8.2 paññāsuttaṃ
tathāvādī 1

adj. of such a view; who speaks like that [tathā + vādī] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning of such a view; who speaks like that
Construction tathā + vādī
Compound kammadhāraya (tathā + vādī)
Commentary (VIN 2.5.7.9) tathāvādinā'ti, tath'āhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā ye'me antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato n'ālaṃ antarāyāyā'ti evaṃ vādinā.
Sanskrit tathāvādin

Example

yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akaṭ'ānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.

VIN PAT PC 69 ukkhittasambhogasikkhāpadaṃ
tathāvādī 2

adj. who tells the exact truth; who tells is like it is; truth speaker [tathā + vādī] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning who tells the exact truth; who tells is like it is; truth speaker
Construction tathā + vādī
Compound kammadhāraya (tathā + vādī)
Sanskrit tathāvādin

Example

taṃ tathāvādiniṃ buddho,
mamaṃ so etadabravi,
na h'evaṃ vandiyā buddhā,
yathā vandasi gotamī.

API 17 mahāpajāpatigotamītherīapadānaṃ
tathāvidha

adj. of such character; of such quality; such a kind of [tathā + vidha] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning of such character; of such quality; such a kind of
Construction tathā + vidha
Compound kammadhāraya (tathā + vidha)
Sanskrit tathā + vidhā

Examples

yo ca tesaṃ tattha tattha,
jānāti anudhammataṃ,
catupañhassa kusalo,
āhu bhikkhuṃ tathāvidhaṃ.

AN 4.42 pañhabyākaraṇasuttaṃ

vibhūtarūpasaññissa,
sabbakāyappahāyino,
ajjhattañ'ca bahiddhā ca,
n'atthi kiñcī'ti passato,
ñāṇaṃ sakk'ānupucchāmi,
kathaṃ neyyo tathāvidho.

SNP 69 posāla māṇava pucchā
pārāyanavaggo 14
tathāvimutta

adj. who is liberated in such way; who is free like this [tathā + vimutta] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning who is liberated in such way; who is free like this
Construction tathā + vimutta
Compound kammadhāraya (tathā + vimutta)
Sanskrit tathā + vimukta

Examples

taṃ ce hi n'āddakkhuṃ tathāvimuttaṃ,
devā manussā idha vā huraṃ vā,
nar'uttamaṃ atthacaraṃ narānaṃ,
ye taṃ namassanti pasaṃsiyā te'ti.

SN 1.34 nasantisuttaṃ

pasaṃsiyā te'pi bhavanti bhikkhū,
ye taṃ namassanti tathāvimuttaṃ,
aññāya dhammaṃ vicikicchaṃ pahāya,
saṅg'ātigā te'pi bhavanti bhikkhū'ti.

tathāhaṃ

sandhi. like I; as I; such as I [tathā + ahaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + pron
Meaning like I; as I; such as I
Construction tathā + ahaṃ
Sanskrit tathā + aham

Examples

tath'āhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā ye'me antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato n'ālaṃ antarāyāyā'ti.

MN 22 alagaddūpamasuttaṃ

tath'āhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇ'āsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā'ti.

SN 22.85 yamakasuttaṃ
tathiya

adj. true; truthful [tatha + iya] ✓

Grammar adj, from tatha
Meaning true; truthful
Construction tatha + iya
Derivative taddhita (iya)
Variant tatiya, taccha
Sanskrit tathya

Examples

saddhammapūjā'pi nesaṃ tath'eva,
yathā pasaṃsanti sak'āyanāni,
sabb'eva vādā tathiyā bhaveyyuṃ,
suddhī hi nesaṃ paccattam'eva.

SNP 51 mahābyūhasuttaṃ
aṭṭhakavaggo 13

na v'āham'etaṃ tathiyan'ti brūmi,
yam'āhu bālā mithu aññam'aññaṃ,
sakaṃ sakaṃ diṭṭhim'akaṃsu saccaṃ,
tasmā hi bālo'ti paraṃ dahanti.

SNP 50 cūḷabyūhasuttaṃ
aṭṭhakavaggo 12
tathiva

adj. true ✗
tathūpama

adj. comparable in the same way; similar to that; like this [tathā + upama] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning comparable in the same way; similar to that; like this
Construction tathā + upama
Compound kammadhāraya (tathā + upama)
Commentary (THIa) tathūpamā'ti taṃsadisā
Sanskrit tathā + upama

Examples

yath'indakhīlo pathavissito siyā,
catubbhi vātehi asampakampiyo,
tath'ūpamaṃ sappurisaṃ vadāmi,
yo ariyasaccāni avecca passati,
idam'pi saṅghe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ,
etena saccena suvatthi hotu.

SNP 13 ratanasuttaṃ,
cūḷavaggo 1

seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, matajaṃ nāma āvudhajātaṃ ubhatodhāraṃ pītanisitaṃ. tadassa saṅghāṭiyā sampārutaṃ sampaliveṭhitaṃ. tath'ūpama-ahaṃ, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno pabbajjaṃ vadāmi.

MN 40 cūḷāssapurasuttaṃ
tathūpamaṃ

ind. like that; in a similar way ✗
tathūpamāhaṃ

sandhi. comparable in the same way I; lit. like this comparison I [tathā + upama + ahaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + adj + pron
Meaning comparable in the same way I; lit. like this comparison I
Construction tathā + upama + ahaṃ
Sanskrit tathā + upama + aham

Examples

seyyathā'pi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko, pehī'ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchā laṅghati, kubbaraṃ hanati, tidaṇḍaṃ bhañjati, tath'ūpam'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmi.

AN 8.14 assakhaḷuṅkasuttaṃ

seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, matajaṃ nāma āvudhajātaṃ ubhatodhāraṃ pītanisitaṃ. tadassa saṅghāṭiyā sampārutaṃ sampaliveṭhitaṃ. tath'ūpam'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno pabbajjaṃ vadāmi.

MN 40 cūḷāssapurasuttaṃ
tatheva 1

sandhi. likewise; in the same way; as it is; as they are; similarly; lit. just like this [tathā + eva] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind
Meaning likewise; in the same way; as it is; as they are; similarly; lit. just like this
Construction tathā + eva
Synonym evameva, evampi
Sanskrit tathā + eva

Examples

yathā ekam'etaṃ akusalaṃ,
samucchindetha paṇḍito,
tath'eva dhamme sikkhetha,
mā no dummaṅkuyaṃ ahu.

AN 7.64 kodhanasuttaṃ

saddhammapūjā'pi nesaṃ tath'eva,
yathā pasaṃsanti sak'āyanāni,
sabb'eva vādā tathiyā bhaveyyuṃ,
suddhī hi nesaṃ paccattam'eva.

SNP 51 mahābyūhasuttaṃ
aṭṭhakavaggo 13
tatheva 2

sandhi. really; truly; still [tatha + eva] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adj + ind
Meaning really; truly; still
Construction tatha + eva
Sanskrit tathya + eva

Examples

atthi nu kho bhante kiñci rūpaṃ yaṃ rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammaṃ sassatisamaṃ tath'eva ṭhassati

SN 22.97 nakhasikhāsuttaṃ

atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ gomayapiṇḍaṃ pāṇinā gahetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca. ettako'pi kho, bhikkhu, attabhāvapaṭilābho n'atthi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tath'eva ṭhassati.

SN 22.56 upādānaparipavattasuttaṃ
tatheva 3

sandhi. just like this; simply the truth; how it is [tatha + eva] ✓

Grammar sandhi, nt + ind
Meaning just like this; simply the truth; how it is
Construction tatha + eva
Sanskrit tathya + eva

Examples

tatra, sunakkhatta, ye te bhikkhū samma'd'eva aññaṃ byākaṃsu tesaṃ taṃ tath'eva hoti

MN 105 sunakkhattasuttaṃ

jānāmi passāmi tath'eva etaṃ,
diṭṭhiyā eke paccenti suddhiṃ,
addakkhi ce kiñ'hi tumassa tena,
atisitvā aññena vadanti suddhiṃ.

SNP 51 mahābyūhasuttaṃ
aṭṭhakavaggo 13
tatheva 4

sandhi. just the same; exactly the same; identical [tathā + eva] ✓

Grammar sandhi, nt + ind
Meaning just the same; exactly the same; identical
Construction tathā + eva
Synonym tādisameva
Sanskrit tathā + eva

Example

saccaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ. tañ'ca kho gāme, no araññe'ti. nanu, āvuso, tath'ev'etaṃ hoti.

VIN 1.1 dutiyapārājikaṃ
tad

pron. that thing (subject or object) [ta + aṃ] ✓

Grammar pron, in comps, nt nom and acc sg of ta
Meaning that thing (subject or object)
Construction ta + aṃ > ad
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Sanskrit tad

Example

yadattanī passati ānisaṃsaṃ,
diṭṭhe sute sīlavate mute vā,
tad'eva so tattha samuggahāya,
nihīnato passati sabbamaññaṃ.

SNP 43 paramaṭṭhakasuttaṃ
aṭṭhakavaggo 5
tadakalla

adj. that is inappropriate; that is unsuitable ✗
tadagge

ind. beginning from that; from that day onwards on; since then; henceforth [tad + agga + e] ~

Grammar ind, adv, comp
Meaning beginning from that; from that day onwards on; since then; henceforth
Construction tad + agga + e
tadagga + e
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Commentary (DNa) tadagge'ti taṃ aggaṃ katvā, tato paṭṭhāyā'ti attho. (DNa) tadagge ... taṃdivasaṃ ādiṃ katvā
Sanskrit tatas
tadaggena

ind. according to that; to that extent ✗
tadaṅga 1

nt. substitution of the opposite factor; lit. that factor [tad + aṅga] ~

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning substitution of the opposite factor; lit. that factor
Construction tad + aṅga
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Sanskrit taḥ + aṅga
tadaṅga 2

adj. in that respect; regarding that; in that aspect; lit. that factor [tad + aṅga] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning in that respect; regarding that; in that aspect; lit. that factor
Construction tad + aṅga
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Sanskrit taḥ + aṅga
tadaṅga 3

nt. that portion ✗
tadaṅganibbāna

nt. complete quenching in that respect; total emancipation in that regard; complete cooling in that aspect [tadaṅga + nibbāna] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning complete quenching in that respect; total emancipation in that regard; complete cooling in that aspect
Construction tadaṅga + nibbāna
Compound kammadhāraya (tadaṅga + nibbāna)
Sanskrit taḥ + aṅga + nirvāṇa

Example

tadaṅganibbānaṃ tadaṅganibbānan'ti, āvuso, vuccati

AN 9.50 tadaṅganibbānasuttaṃ
tadaṅganibbānasutta

nt. Aṅguttara Nikāya 9.50 (AN9.50) ✗
tadaṅganibbuta

adj. quenched in that regard; emancipated in that aspect; cooled in that respect [tadaṅga + nibbuta] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning quenched in that regard; emancipated in that aspect; cooled in that respect
Construction tadaṅga + nibbuta
Commentary (SNa) tadaṅganibbuto'ti tena vipassan'aṅgena kilesānaṃ nibbutattā tadaṅganibbuto. imasmiṃ sutte vipassanā'va kathitā.
tadaṅganissaraṇa

nt. escape by substitution of the opposite factor; lit. escape by that factor [tadaṅga + nissaraṇa] ~

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning escape by substitution of the opposite factor; lit. escape by that factor
Construction tadaṅga + nissaraṇa
tadaṅgavimutti

fem. liberation by (elmination of the opposite of) that factor; lit. that factor liberation [tadaṅga + vimutti] ~

Grammar fem, comp
Meaning liberation by (elmination of the opposite of) that factor; lit. that factor liberation
Construction tadaṅga + vimutti
Compound tatiyā tappurisa (tadaṅgena + vimutti)
Commentary (MNa) anicc'ānupassan'ādikā satta anupassanā sayaṃ tassa tassa paccanīk'aṅgavasena paricattāhi niccasaññ'ādīhi vimuttattā tadaṅgavimuttī'ti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
Notes five vimutti 1. vikkhambhanavimutti, 2. tadaṅgavimutti, 3. samucchedavimutti, 4. paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5. nissaraṇavimutti
Sanskrit taḥ + aṅga + vimukti
tadaṅgena

ind. in that respect; by that means; in that regard; with that quality [tad + aṅga + ena] ✓

Grammar ind, adv, comp, instr sg of tadaṅga
Meaning in that respect; by that means; in that regard; with that quality
Construction tad + aṅga + ena
tadaṅga + ena
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Synonym tenaṅgena
Commentary (MNa) tadaṅgenā'ti tassā bhav'ūpapattiyā aṅgena, bhav'ūpapattikāraṇenā'ti attho.
Sanskrit taḥ + aṅga

Example

yattha kāmā nirujjhanti, ye ca kāme nirodhetvā nirodhetvā viharanti, addhā te āyasmanto nicchātā nibbutā tiṇṇā pāraṅ'gatā tadaṅgenā'ti vadāmi

AN 9.33 anupubba vihāra samāpattisuttaṃ
tadajjahaṃ

sandhi. that today I; that now I [tad + ajja + ahaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + ind + pron
Meaning that today I; that now I
Construction tad + ajja + ahaṃ
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Sanskrit tam + adya

Example

idaṃ pure cittam'acāri cārikaṃ,
yen'icchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ,
tadajj'ahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso,
hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho.

TH 262 tālapuṭattheragāthā
tadajjhagamā

imperf. got that; obtained that; achieved that [tad + ajjhagamā] ~

Grammar imperf, comp vb
Meaning got that; obtained that; achieved that
Construction tad + ajjhagamā
Commentary (JAa) adassanaṃ'y'eva tadajjhagamā'ti tato paṭṭhāya adassanam'eva gato'ti. (VINt) tadā ajjhagamā tadajjhagamā.
tadañña 1

pron. that other; those others [tad + añña] ✓

Grammar pron, comp
Meaning that other; those others
Construction tad + añña
Compound kammadhāraya (tad + añña)
Sanskrit tad + anya

Example

evam'eva kho, bhikkhave, yam'idaṃ dhammasamādānaṃ paccuppannasukhañ'c'eva āyatiñ'ca sukhavipākaṃ tadaññe puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇaparappavāde abhivihacca bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate cā'ti.

MN 46 mahādhammasamādānasuttaṃ
tadañña 2

pron. different to that [tad + añña] ~

Grammar pron, comp
Meaning different to that
Construction tad + añña

tadatthaṅgata

adj. that has vanished; that has disappeared [tad + atthaṅgata] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning that has vanished; that has disappeared
Construction tad + atthaṅgata
tadatthajotaka

adj. clearly expressing that meaning [tad + attha + jotaka] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning clearly expressing that meaning
Construction tad + attha + jotaka
Commentary (PYt) tadatthajotakānan'ti so'y'eva attho tadattho, tassa jotakā tadatthajotakā, tesaṃ. idāni veditabbānī'ti sambandho.
tadatthadīpana

adj. explaining the meaning of that; (or) illuminating that goal [tad + attha + dīpana] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning explaining the meaning of that; (or) illuminating that goal
Construction tad + attha + dīpana
Compound dutiyā tappurisa (tadatthaṃ + dīpana)
Commentary (SNt) tadatthadīpanā'ti tassa ādito vuttassa atthassa dīpanā.

Example

dhammo padīpo viya tassa satthuno, yo magga-pāk'āmata-bheda-bhinnako, lok'uttaro yo ca tadattha'dīpano

Thai

tadatthavaṇṇanā

fem. explanation of the meaning of that [tadattha + vaṇṇanā] ~

Grammar fem, comp
Meaning explanation of the meaning of that
Construction tadattha + vaṇṇanā
tadatthaṃ

ind. for that purpose ✗
tadatthika

adj. seeking that; desiring that ✗
tadadhimutto

sandhi. focused on that; intent on that; devoted to that [tad + adhimutto] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + pp
Meaning focused on that; intent on that; devoted to that
Construction tad + adhimutto
Commentary (ANa) tadadhimutto'ti tasmiṃ adhimutto, taṃ vā adhimutto.
Sanskrit tam + adhimukta

Example

so tadassādeti, taṃ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṃ āpajjati. tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṃ kurumāno brahmakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.

AN 4.123 paṭhamanānākaraṇasuttaṃ
tadanatta

masc. that is non-self [tad + anatta] ~

Grammar masc, comp, atta group
Meaning that is non-self
Construction tad + anatta
tadanantaraṃ

ind. continuously [tad + anantara + aṃ] ~

Grammar ind, adv, comp
Meaning continuously
Construction tad + anantara + aṃ
tadanicca

adj. that is impermanent; that is unstable [tad + anicca] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning that is impermanent; that is unstable
Construction tad + anicca
Compound kammadhāraya (tad + anicca)
Sanskrit tad + anitya

Example

so iti paṭisañcikkhati, idam'pi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitaṃ. yaṃ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitaṃ tadaniccaṃ nirodhadhamman'ti pajānāti.

MN 52 aṭṭhakanāgarasuttaṃ
tadanugāyati

pr. chants that; recites that [tad + anugāyati] ~

Grammar pr, comp vb
Meaning chants that; recites that
Construction tad + anugāyati
Commentary (DNa) tadanugāyantī'ti etarahi brāhmaṇā taṃ tehi pubbe gītaṃ anugāyanti anusajjhāyanti.
tadanuggahakāmatā

fem. desire for that support ✗
tadanucchavika

adj. about what is suitable; regarding what is proper; about what is appropriate; lit. that following the skin [tad + anucchavika] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning about what is suitable; regarding what is proper; about what is appropriate; lit. that following the skin
Construction tad + anucchavika
Synonym tadanulomika
Commentary (VINa) bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomikan'ti tattha sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ idāni sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessati, tassa anucchavikañ'c'eva anulomikañ'ca. yo vā ayaṃ subharat'ādīhi saṃvaro vutto, tassa anucchavikañ'c'eva anulomikañ'ca saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ asuttantavinibaddhaṃ pāḷivinimuttaṃ okkantikadhammadesanaṃ katvā'ti attho.
tadanuttaraṃ

sandhi. that unsurpassed [tad + anuttaraṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + adj
Meaning that unsurpassed
Construction tad + anuttaraṃ
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Commentary (DNa) tadanuttaran'ti taṃ anuttaraṃ.
Sanskrit tad + anuttaram

Example

atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahit'atto viharanto nacirass'eva, yass'atthāya kulaputtā samma'd'eva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭh'eva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.

SN 22.63 upādiyamānasuttaṃ
tadanuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ

idiom. that unsurpassed goal of the spiritual path [tad + anuttaraṃ + brahmacariya + pariyosānaṃ] ✓

Grammar idiom, pron + adj + nt + nt
Meaning that unsurpassed goal of the spiritual path
Construction tad + anuttaraṃ + brahmacariya + pariyosānaṃ
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Commentary (MNa) tadanuttaran'ti taṃ anuttaraṃ. brahmacariyapariyosānan'ti maggabrahmacariyassa pariyosānaṃ, arahattaphalan'ti vuttaṃ hoti. tassa hi atthāya kulaputtā pabbajanti.

Example

tadanuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭh'eva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.

MN 7 vatthasuttaṃ
tadanudhammañca

sandhi. and according to that; and in line with that; and along those lines [tad + anudhammaṃ + ca] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + adv + ind
Meaning and according to that; and in line with that; and along those lines
Construction tad + anudhammaṃ + ca
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
ṃc > ñc
Sanskrit tam + anu + dharma + ca

Examples

so evaṃ pajānāti, imañ'ce ahaṃ upekkhaṃ evaṃ parisuddhaṃ evaṃ pariyodātaṃ ākās'ānañc'āyatanaṃ upasaṃhareyyaṃ, tadanudhammañ'ca cittaṃ bhāveyyaṃ, evaṃ me ayaṃ upekkhā taṃnissitā tadupādānā ciraṃ dīgham'addhānaṃ tiṭṭheyya.

MN 140 dhātuvibhaṅgasuttaṃ

lok'āmis'ādhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatirūpī c'eva kathā saṇṭhāti, tadanudhammañ'ca anuvitakketi, anuvicāreti, tañ'ca purisaṃ bhajati, tena ca vittiṃ āpajjati

MN 105 sunakkhattasuttaṃ
tadanubhāsati

pr. continuously repeats that [tad + anubhāsati] ~

Grammar pr, comp vb
Meaning continuously repeats that
Construction tad + anubhāsati
tadanurūpa

adj. suitable; appropriate; relevant; lit. conforming to that [tad + anurūpa] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning suitable; appropriate; relevant; lit. conforming to that
Construction tad + anurūpa
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound kammadhāraya (tad + anurūpa)
Synonym anukūla, anucchavi, anucchavika, upiya, kappa, tajja, tathārūpa, paṭirūpa, patirūpa, patirūpī, pattayutta, yutta, yuttaka, yuttarūpa, sāmaggiya, sāruppa
Sanskrit tad + anurūpa

Example

atha kho candanaṅgaliko upāsako bhagavato sammukhā tadanurūpāya gāthāya abhitthavi

tadanulomika 1

Construction tad + anulomika
Synonym tadanucchavika
Commentary (VINa) bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomikan'ti tattha sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ idāni sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessati, tassa anucchavikañ'c'eva anulomikañ'ca. yo vā ayaṃ subharat'ādīhi saṃvaro vutto, tassa anucchavikañ'c'eva anulomikañ'ca saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ asuttantavinibaddhaṃ pāḷivinimuttaṃ okkantikadhammadesanaṃ katvā'ti attho.
tadanulomika 2

adj. which accords with that ✗

prp. remembering that; recollecting that [tad + anussaranta] ~

Grammar prp, comp vb
Meaning remembering that; recollecting that
Construction tad + anussaranta
Synonym tamanussaramāna

tadantaraṃ

Construction tad + antara + aṃ
tadantara + aṃ

Commentary (ANa) tadantaran'ti taṃ antaraṃ khaṇaṃ okāsaṃ.
tadantalopa

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning (gram) elision of the end of that
Construction tad + antalopa
tadanvaya

adj. following that; emulating that; conforming to that; lit. going along with that [tad + anvaya] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning following that; emulating that; conforming to that; lit. going along with that
Construction tad + anvaya
Phonetic Change ṃ > d
Compound dutiyā tappurisa (tad + anvaya)
Commentary (SNa) tadanvayā'ti taṃ anugacchamānā, anuvattamānā'ti attho.
Sanskrit tad + anvaya

Example

katamassa ekassa paññ'indriyassa paññavato, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tadanvayā saddhā saṇṭhāti, tadanvayaṃ vīriyaṃ saṇṭhāti, tadanvayā sati saṇṭhāti, tadanvayo samādhi saṇṭhāti.

SN 48.45 paṭhamapubbārāmasuttaṃ
tadapi

sandhi. that itself; just that [tad + api] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + ind
Meaning that itself; just that
Construction tad + api
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Sanskrit taḥ + api

Examples

tatr'āvuso, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkhaṃ paññapenti, tadapi phassapaccayā.

SN 12.25 bhūmijasuttaṃ

yadapi, bhikkhave, alobho tadapi kusalamūlaṃ. yadapi aluddho abhisaṅkharoti kāyena vācāya manasā tadapi kusalaṃ.

AN 3.70 akusalamūlasuttaṃ
tadappatiṭṭhita

adj. that unestablished; that ungrounded; that unsupported [tad + appatiṭṭhita] ✓

Grammar adj, comp, neg
Meaning that unestablished; that ungrounded; that unsupported
Construction tad + appatiṭṭhita
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Commentary (SNa) tadappatiṭṭhitan'ti taṃ appatiṭṭhitaṃ.
Sanskrit tad + na + pratiṣṭhita

Example

tadappatiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ avirūḷhaṃ anabhisaṅkhacca vimuttaṃ. vimuttattā ṭhitaṃ. ṭhitattā santusitaṃ. santusitattā na paritassati. aparitassaṃ paccattaññ'eva parinibbāyati.

SN 22.53 upayasuttaṃ

tadabhiññāya

ger. directly knowing that; personally understanding that; directly realizing that [tad + abhiññāya] ✓

Grammar ger, comp vb
Meaning directly knowing that; personally understanding that; directly realizing that
Construction tad + abhiññāya
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound comp verb (tad + abhiññāya)
Synonym tadabhiññā
Commentary (MNa) tadabhiññāyā'ti taṃ nibbānaṃ jānitvā sacchikatvā.
Sanskrit tad + abhijña

Examples

te tadabhiññāya tassa sacchikiriyāya dhammaṃ desenti. evaṃvādino'pi kho, bhikkhave, santi sattā. evaṃvādīnam'pi kho, bhikkhave, sattānaṃ atth'eva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo.

AN 10.29 paṭhamakosalasuttaṃ

pathaviṃ kho ahaṃ, brahme, pathavito abhiññāya yāvatā pathaviyā pathavattena ananubhūtaṃ tadabhiññāya pathaviṃ n'āp'ahosiṃ, pathaviyā n'āp'ahosiṃ, pathavito n'āp'ahosiṃ, pathaviṃ me'ti n'āp'ahosiṃ, pathaviṃ n'ābhivadiṃ.

MN 49 brahmanimantanikasuttaṃ
tadabhiññāvimutta

adj. that (person) liberated by direct knowledge ✗

aor. directly knew that; understood that experientially [tad + abhiññāsi] ✓

Grammar aor, comp vb
Meaning directly knew that; understood that experientially
Construction tad + abhiññāsi
Compound comp verb (tad + abhiññāsi)
Sanskrit tad + abhijña

Example

pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiparamā kho, bhagini, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā attho'ti abhinibbattesuṃ. yāvatā kho, bhagini, pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiparamatā, tadabhiññāsi bhagavā. tadabhiññāya bhagavā assādam'addasa ādīnavam'addasa nissaraṇam'addasa magg'āmaggañāṇadassanam'addasa.

Meaning having completely avoided that; having shunned that; having steered clear of that

Commentary (ANa) iminā ca padena vipassanā kathitā, tadabhinivattetvā'ti iminā maggo.
tadamantarā

ind. in the meantime; meanwhile ✗
tadamariyānaṃ

sandhi. that for the noble ones [tad + idaṃ + ariyānaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + pron + masc
Meaning that for the noble ones
Construction tad + idaṃ + ariyānaṃ
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Commentary (SNPa) ta'dam'ariyānan'ti idaṃ ariyānaṃ, anunāsikaikāralopaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
Sanskrit tam + idam + āryebhyaḥ

Example

yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya idaṃ saccan'ti upanijjhāyitaṃ ta'dam'ariyānaṃ etaṃ musā'ti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ, ayam'ek'ānupassanā.

SNP 38 dvayatānupassanāsuttaṃ
tadaminā

sandhi. that by this [tad + iminā] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + pron
Meaning that by this
Construction tad + iminā
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Sanskrit taḥ + anena, enena

Example

tadaminā'pi jānātha,
yathāmedaṃ nidassanaṃ,
caṇḍālaputto sopāko,
mātaṅgo iti vissuto.

SNP 7 vasalasuttaṃ
uragavaggo 7
tadamināpetaṃ

sandhi. that just by this; in this (way) [tad + aminā + api + etaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + pron + ind + pron
Meaning that just by this; in this (way)
Construction tad + aminā + api + etaṃ
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Sanskrit taḥ + anena + pi + etam

Example

saññā nu kho, tadaminā'p'etaṃ, poṭṭhapāda, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā aññā'va saññā bhavissati añño attā.

DN 9.4 poṭṭhapādasuttaṃ, saññāattakathā
tadariya

masc. that noble person; that ethical man [tad + ariya] ~

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning that noble person; that ethical man
Construction tad + ariya
tadariyā

sandhi. that the noble ones [tad + ariyā] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + masc
Meaning that the noble ones
Construction tad + ariyā
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Sanskrit tam + āryāḥ

Examples

amosadhammaṃ nibbānaṃ,
tadariyā saccato vidū,
te ve sacc'ābhisamayā,
nicchātā parinibbutā'ti.

SNP 38 dvayatānupassanāsuttaṃ

yaṃ pare sukhato āhu,
tadariyā āhu dukkhato,
yaṃ pare dukkhato āhu,
tadariyā sukhato vidū.

SNP 38 dvayatānupassanāsuttaṃ
tadavacchādanapaccupaṭṭhāna

adj. having the manifestation of concealing those (good qualities) ✗
tadavasari

aor. went there; wandered there; arrived there; lit. went down to that [tad + avasari] ✓

Grammar aor, comp vb
Meaning went there; wandered there; arrived there; lit. went down to that
Construction tad + avasari
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound comp verb (tad + avasari)
Commentary (MNa) tadavasarin'ti tattha osariṃ.
Sanskrit tad + avasāri (bsk)

Examples

so kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, kiṃ kusalagavesī anuttaraṃ santivarapadaṃ pariyesamāno magadhesu anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena uruvelā senānigamo tadavasariṃ.

MN 26 pāsarāsisuttaṃ

evaṃ me sutaṃ, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā mallesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ yena thūṇaṃ nāma mallānaṃ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.

UD 69 udapānasuttaṃ
tadassa 1

sandhi. that would be; that could be [tad + assa] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + opt
Meaning that would be; that could be
Construction tad + assa
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Commentary (ANa) tadassā'ti taṃ evaṃ ... bhaveyya.
Sanskrit taḥ + syāt

Examples

seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, matajaṃ nāma āvudhajātaṃ ubhatodhāraṃ pītanisitaṃ. tadassa saṅghāṭiyā sampārutaṃ sampaliveṭhitaṃ. tath'ūpam'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno pabbajjaṃ vadāmi.

MN 40 cūḷāssapurasuttaṃ

sabbasāmukkaṃsikaṃ vata me samaṇo gotamo pañhaṃ puṭṭho saṃsādeti, no vissajjeti, na nūna visahatī'ti. tadassa uttiyassa paribbājakassa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyā'ti.

AN 10.95 uttiyasuttaṃ
tadassa 2

sandhi. that is his [tad + assa] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + pron
Meaning that is his
Construction tad + assa
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Sanskrit taḥ + asya

Example

yaṃ hi'ssa, bhante, vīriyaṃ tadassa vīriy'indriyaṃ.

SN 48.50 āpaṇasuttaṃ
tadassādeti

sandhi. relishes that; takes pleasure in that; likes that [tad + assādeti] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + pr
Meaning relishes that; takes pleasure in that; likes that
Construction tad + assādeti
Commentary (ANa) tadassādetī'ti taṃ jhānaṃ sukh'assādena assādeti.
Sanskrit tam + āsvādayati

Example

so tadassādeti, taṃ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṃ āpajjati. tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṃ kurumāno brahmakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.

AN 4.123 paṭhamanānākaraṇasuttaṃ
tadassita

adj. living there [tad + assita] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning living there
Construction tad + assita
Commentary (DNa) yattha bhummā tadassitā'ti yesu yesu ṭhānesu bhummā devatā taṃ taṃ nissitā.
tadahu

nt. that very day; same day [tad + ahu] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning that very day; same day
Construction tad + ahu
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound kammadhāraya (tad + ahu)
Commentary (DNa) tadahū'ti tasmiṃ ahu, tasmiṃ divase'ti attho.
Sanskrit tadahar

Examples

mātugāmo nāma manuss'itthī, na yakkhī na petī, na tiracchānagatā. antamaso tadahujātā'pi dārikā, pag'eva mahattarī.

VIN 1.2.2 kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpadaṃ

tadahu pabbajito santo,
jātiyā sattavassiko,
so'pi maṃ anusāseyya,
sampaṭicchāmi matthake.

MIL 6.4.8 gorūpaṅga pañha
tadahujāta

adj. born that very day; born the same day [tad + ahu + jāta] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning born that very day; born the same day
Construction tad + ahu + jāta
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound kammadhāraya (tadahu + jāta)
Commentary (VINa) tadahujātā'ti taṃdivasaṃ jātā jātamattā allamaṃsapesivaṇṇā
Sanskrit tadahar + jāta

Example

mātugāmo nāma manuss'itthī, na yakkhī na petī, na tiracchānagatā. antamaso tadahujātā'pi dārikā, pag'eva mahattarī.

VIN 1.2.2 kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpadaṃ
tadahupasampanna

adj. ordained that very day [tadaha + upasampanna] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning ordained that very day
Construction tadaha + upasampanna
Commentary (VINt) tadahupasampannassā'ti taṃ divasam'pi upasampannassa.
tadahuposathe

sandhi. on that observance day; that being the observance day [tad + aha + uposathe] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + nt + adv
Meaning on that observance day; that being the observance day
Construction tad + aha + uposathe
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Commentary (SNa) tadah'uposathe'ti tasmiṃ ahu uposathe, uposathadivase'ti attho.
Sanskrit taḥ + upavasatha

Examples

tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadah'uposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.

UD 45 uposathasuttaṃ

idh'ānanda, rañño mahāsudassanassa tadah'uposathe pannarase sīsaṃ nhātassa uposathikassa uparipāsādavaragatassa dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pāturahosi sahass'āraṃ sanemikaṃ sanābhikaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ.

DN 17.3 mahāsudassanasuttaṃ
tadahuppanna

adj. which appeared on that same day; which becomes available on that very day [tad + ahu + uppanna] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning which appeared on that same day; which becomes available on that very day
Construction tad + ahu + uppanna
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound kammadhāraya (tadahu + uppanna)
Sanskrit tadahar + utpanna

Example

tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya satiyā'pi paccāsāyā'ti tadah'uppanne mūlacīvare paccāsācīvaraṃ uppajjati, das'āhā kāretabbaṃ.

VIN 1.4.1.3 tatiyakathinasikkhāpadaṃ
tadahūpasampanna

adj. ordained that very day; given higher ordination on the same day [tadahu + upasampanna] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning ordained that very day; given higher ordination on the same day
Construction tadahu + upasampanna
Compound kammadhāraya (tadahu + upasampanna)
Commentary (ANa) tadah'ūpasampannassā'ti taṃdivasaṃ upasampannassa.
Sanskrit tadahar + upasaṃpanna

Example

vassasat'ūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadah'ūpasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kattabbaṃ. ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

AN 8.51 gotamīsuttaṃ
tadahe

ind. that day, that very day ✗
tadā

ind. then; at that time [ta + dā] ✓

Grammar ind, adv, from ta
Meaning then; at that time
Construction ta + dā
Derivative taddhita (dā)
Sanskrit tadā

Examples

āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ,
yadā kāyaṃ jahant'imaṃ,
apaviddho tadā seti,
parabhattaṃ acetanaṃ.

SN 22.95 pheṇapiṇḍūpamasuttaṃ

dassanaṃ me atikkante,
sasaṅghe lokanāyake,
sayanā vuṭṭhahitvāna,
pallaṅkaṃ ābhujiṃ tadā.

BV 2.77 sumedha patthanā kathā
tadāgami

aor. came there; lit. came to that [tad + āgami] ~

Grammar aor, comp vb
Meaning came there; lit. came to that
Construction tad + āgami
Commentary (DNa) āpo ca devā pathavī, tejo vāyo tadāgamun'ti āpokasiṇ'ādīsu parikammaṃ katvā nibbattā āpo'tiādināmakā devā āgamuṃ.
tadācaranta

prp. doing that; performing that; engaging in that [tad + ācaranta] ~

Grammar prp, comp vb
Meaning doing that; performing that; engaging in that
Construction tad + ācaranta
Commentary (SNa) mā sajjittho tadācaran'ti evaṃ dhammakathaṃ ācaranto mā laggi.
Sanskrit tad + ācarat
tadādhigacchati

pr. gets at that time; obtains then; (comm) gets that [tadā + adhigacchati] ~

Grammar pr, comp vb
Meaning gets at that time; obtains then; (comm) gets that
Construction tadā + adhigacchati
Commentary (DNa) tadādhigacchatī'ti taṃ adhigacchati.
tadādhimutta

masc. name of a privately enlightened Buddha; lit. intent on that [tad + adhimutta] ~

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning name of a privately enlightened Buddha; lit. intent on that
Construction tad + adhimutta
Sanskrit tam + adhimukta
tadānisaṃsa

adj. (aiming at) that good result; with that benefit (in mind); (comm) benefit of arahantship [tad + ānisaṃsa] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning (aiming at) that good result; with that benefit (in mind); (comm) benefit of arahantship
Construction tad + ānisaṃsa
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound sattamī tappurisa (tasmiṃ + ānisaṃsa)
Commentary (SNa) tadānisaṃso'ti arahatt'ānisaṃso.
Sanskrit tad + anuśaṃsa (bsk)

Example

bhikkhu siyā jhāyī vimuttacitto,
ākaṅkhe ce hadayass'ānupattiṃ,
lokassa ñatvā udayabbayañ'ca,
sucetaso anissito tadānisaṃso'ti.

SN 2.2 dutiyakassapasuttaṃ
tadāpi

sandhi. right then; even at that time [tadā + api] ✓

Grammar sandhi, adv + ind
Meaning right then; even at that time
Construction tadā + api
Antonym yadāpi
Sanskrit tadā + api

Examples

taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvuso yamaka, yadā hi so puriso amuṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ āha, upaṭṭhaheyyaṃ taṃ, bhante'ti, tadā'pi so vadhako'va, vadhakañ'ca pana santaṃ na aññāsi, vadhako me'ti.

SN 22.85 yamakasuttaṃ

tadā'pi me, bhikkhave, amanāpā nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa mantaṃ vācetuṃ, kim'aṅga pana etarahi na amanāpā bhavissati nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ.

VIN 2.7.7 pādukavaggo
tadāyatana

nt. that dimension; that field; that base [tad + āyatana] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning that dimension; that field; that base
Construction tad + āyatana
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound kammadhāraya (tad + āyatana)
Commentary (MNa) tadāyatanan'ti taṃ āyatanaṃ, paramassāsabhāvena patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ arahattan'ti attho. (UDa) tadāyatanan'ti taṃ kāraṇaṃ. dakāro padasandhikaro.
Sanskrit tad + āyatana

Examples

atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatanaṃ, yattha n'eva pathavī, na āpo, na tejo, na vāyo, na ākās'ānañc'āyatanaṃ, na viññāṇ'añc'āyatanaṃ, na ākiñcaññ'āyatanaṃ, na n'evasaññān'āsaññ'āyatanaṃ, n'āyaṃ loko, na paraloko, na ubho candimasūriyā.

UD 71 paṭhamanibbānapaṭisaṃyuttasuttaṃ

kudāssu nām'āhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmi yadariyā eta'r'ahi āyatanaṃ upasampajja viharantī'ti iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato uppajjati pihapaccayā domanassaṃ.

MN 137 saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasuttaṃ
tadāyattavuttitā

fem. ?? state of dependence on that [tad + āyatta + vuttitā] ~

Grammar fem, abstr, comp
Meaning ?? state of dependence on that
Construction tad + āyatta + vuttitā
tadārammaṇa 1

adj. with that as its object; based on that [tad + ārammaṇa] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning with that as its object; based on that
Construction tad + ārammaṇa
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound kammadhāraya (tad + ārammaṇa)
Commentary (MNa) tadārammaṇañ'cā'ti tass'eva mettacittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
Sanskrit tam + ālambana

Example

tañ'ca puggalaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā pharitvā viharissāma, tadārammaṇañ'ca sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cittena vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharissāmā'ti.

MN 21 kakacūpamasuttaṃ
tadārammaṇa 2

nt. registration (consciousness, which has the same object as the javana that preceded it in the citta-vīthi) ✗

Meaning that was; they were
Construction tad + āsi

Grammar aor 3rd pl of tadāsi, comp vb (+nom)
Meaning they were; those were
Construction tad + āsuṃ

perf. said that [tad + āha] ~

Grammar perf, comp vb
Meaning said that
Construction tad + āha
Commentary (JAa) tadāhū'ti taṃ āhu.
tadāhāra

adj. eating that food; with that nutriment [tad + āhāra] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning eating that food; with that nutriment
Construction tad + āhāra
Commentary (SNa) tadāhāro'ti taṃpaccayo.
tadāhāranirodha

masc. ending of that sustenance; cessation of that fuel [tad + āhāra + nirodha] ✓

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning ending of that sustenance; cessation of that fuel
Construction tad + āhāra + nirodha
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (tadāhārassa + nirodha)
Antonym tadāhārasambhava
Commentary (SNa) tadāhāranirodhā'ti tesaṃ āhārānaṃ nirodhena.
Sanskrit tam + āhāra + nirodha

Examples

bhūtam'idan'ti, bhikkhave, passathā'ti? evaṃ, bhante. tadāhārasambhavan'ti, bhikkhave, passathā'ti? evaṃ, bhante. tadāhāranirodhā yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ nirodhadhamman'ti, bhikkhave, passathā'ti? evaṃ, bhante.

MN 38 mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ

tadāhāranirodhā yaṃ bhūtaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman'ti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passati.

SN 12.31 bhūtasuttaṃ
tadāhārasambhava

adj. produced by that fuel; generated by that sustenance [tad + āhāra + sambhava] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning produced by that fuel; generated by that sustenance
Construction tad + āhāra + sambhava
Compound tatiyā tappurisa (tadāhārena + sambhava)
Commentary (MNa) tadāhārasambhavan'ti taṃ pan'etaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ āhārasambhavaṃ paccayasambhavaṃ, sati paccaye uppajjati evaṃ passathā'ti pucchati.
Sanskrit tam + āhāra + sambhava

Example

bhūtam'idan'ti, bhikkhave, passathā'ti? evaṃ, bhante. tadāhārasambhavan'ti, bhikkhave, passathā'ti? evaṃ, bhante. tadāhāranirodhā yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ nirodhadhamman'ti, bhikkhave, passathā'ti? evaṃ, bhante.

MN 38 mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ
tadāhu

perf. they said that [tad + āhu] ~

Grammar perf 3rd pl of tadāha, comp vb
Meaning they said that
Construction tad + āhu
Commentary (JAa) tadāhū'ti taṃ āhu.
tadiṅgha

sandhi. please ... that!; pray ... that!; come now … that! [tad + iṅgha] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + ind
Meaning please ... that!; pray ... that!; come now … that!
Construction tad + iṅgha
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Commentary (SNPa) tadiṅgha brūhī'ti taṃ mayā pucchitamatthaṃ brūhi yācāmi taṃ ahan'ti. yācan'attho hi iṅghā'ti nipāto.
Sanskrit tam + aṅga

Example

kutopahūtā kalahā vivādā,
paridevasokā sahamaccharā ca,
mān'ātimānā sahapesuṇā ca,
kutopahūtā te tadiṅgha brūhi.

SNP 49 kalahavivādasuttaṃ
aṭṭhakavaggo 11
tadidaṃ

sandhi. this thing; this state; lit. that this [tad + idaṃ] ✓

Grammar sandhi, pron + pron
Meaning this thing; this state; lit. that this
Construction tad + idaṃ
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Sanskrit taḥ + idam

Examples

kadā nu'haṃ dubbacanena vutto,
tatonimittaṃ vimano na hessaṃ,
atho pasattho'pi tatonimittaṃ,
tuṭṭho na hessaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.

TH 262 tālapuṭattheragāthā

kadā nu kaṭṭhe ca tiṇe latā ca,
khandhe ime'haṃ amite ca dhamme,
ajjhattikān'eva ca bāhirāni ca,
samaṃ tuleyyaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.

TH 262 tālapuṭattheragāthā
taduṭṭhāya

ind. arising from that ✗
taduttari

ind. more than that [tad + uttari] ~

Grammar ind, adv, comp
Meaning more than that
Construction tad + uttari
Variant tatuttari, tatuttariṃ
Commentary (VINt) tato uttariṃ taduttariṃ, tassa tassa vuttappamāṇato atirekaṃ.
tadupāgami

aor. come to that; arrived at that [tad + upāgami] ~

Grammar aor, comp vb
Meaning come to that; arrived at that
Construction tad + upāgami
Commentary (SNPa) tadupāgamun'ti tadā upāgamuṃ. (THa) tadupāgamaṃ tadeva upagacchin'ti attho.
tadupātivatta

adj. gone beyond that; transcended that [tad + upātivatta] ~

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning gone beyond that; transcended that
Construction tad + upātivatta
tadupādāna

adj. clinging to that; grasping that; attached to that [tad + upādāna] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning clinging to that; grasping that; attached to that
Construction tad + upādāna
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound alutta dutiyā tappurisa (tad + upādāna)
Commentary (MNa) tadupādānan'ti sā'va taṇhā gahaṇaṭṭhena upādānaṃ nāma.
Sanskrit tam + upādāna

Examples

so evaṃ pajānāti, imañ'ce ahaṃ upekkhaṃ evaṃ parisuddhaṃ evaṃ pariyodātaṃ ākās'ānañc'āyatanaṃ upasaṃhareyyaṃ, tadanudhammañ'ca cittaṃ bhāveyyaṃ, evaṃ me ayaṃ upekkhā taṃnissitā tadupādānā ciraṃ dīgham'addhānaṃ tiṭṭheyya.

MN 140 dhātuvibhaṅgasuttaṃ

tassa taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī. yā vedanāsu nandī tadupādānaṃ, tass'upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti.

MN 38 mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ
tadupādāya

ger. on account of that; dependent on that [tad + upādāya] ~

Grammar ger, comp vb
Meaning on account of that; dependent on that
Construction tad + upādāya
Commentary (NIDD1a) tadupādāyā'ti tato paṭṭhāya.
tadupiya

adj. suitable for that; appropriate for that [tad + upiya] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning suitable for that; appropriate for that
Construction tad + upiya
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound catutthī tappurisa (tassa + upiya)
Synonym tassāruppa
Commentary (VINa) tadupiyaṃ byañjanan'ti tassa odanassa anurūpaṃ maccha-maṃsa-sāka-phala-kaḷīr'ādi-byañjanaṃ.
Sanskrit tad + upaka (bsk)

Examples

tesaṃ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā thālipākasahassānaṃ eko'y'eva so thālipāko hoti yato nāḷik'odanaparamaṃ bhuñjāmi tadupiyañ'ca sūpeyyaṃ.

SN 22.96 gomayapiṇḍasuttaṃ

majjhimo nāma patto nāḷik'odanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.

VIN 1.4.3.1 pattasikkhāpadaṃ
tadupeta

adj. endowed with that ✗

adj. both of those [tad + ubhaya] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning both of those
Construction tad + ubhaya
Phonetic Change ṃ > d (Kacc 34, 52)
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (tesaṃ + ubhaya)
Variant tadūbhaya
Sanskrit taḥ + ubha

Examples

anattamanatā ca attamanatā ca, tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.

MN 137 saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasuttaṃ

nānappakārakaṃ nāma katam'pi akatam'pi kat'ākatam'pi. kataṃ nāma sīs'ūpagaṃ gīv'ūpagaṃ hatth'ūpagaṃ pād'ūpagaṃ kaṭ'ūpagaṃ. akataṃ nāma ghanakataṃ vuccati. kat'ākataṃ nāma tadubhayaṃ.

VIN 1.4.2.9 rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpadaṃ

Meaning doing both of those
Construction tadubhaya + karaṇa
